ygData.subject: Nightmares . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: NIGHTLIGHT finds her self in some sort of strange tunnel, there is barely enough light to see by. She can feel heat and ahead of her is some sort of light.

Subject: Nightmares . . .

NIGHTLIGHT finds her self in some sort of strange tunnel, there is
barely enough light to see by. She can feel heat and ahead of her is
some sort of light. Stone dirt and grit crunched benath her feet as
she walked a slight breeze blows against her smells vaguely of rotting
meat and smoke. In the distance she can hear a sound, like metal on
metal, a clanging that echoes down the hall.

She arrives in a large chamber where the light is much brighter. Fire
surrounds the room on all sides, even blocking the door she had just
came through. The cieling is tall, hundeds of feet in the air and in
the center of the room is a tall mound of what look like dinosaur
bones . . . or is it scraps of metal . . . it is difficult to tell in
the flickering light from the fire all around her - the heat is
burning as she stands there.

In the center of it all she can see what appears to RODIMUS, or at
least two of him. One is the red, yellow and orange one that looks to
be her husband. The other is black, grey and silver, almost a reverse
image of the RODIMUS she knew - it was DARK RODIMUS!

RODIMUS and DARK RODIMUS fought and that is the clanging that she
heard, the two of them locked into combat, and she knew deep within
her that this one was to the death.


The fire around her gre hotter and hotter as the battle rose in pitch
and intensity, both combatants striking each other, large dents and
rips mar both of their frames.

Both of them dropped their weapons, their ammunition spent and they
rush at each other, thier faces determined. As they connect they both
burst into flames, black and silver, red and yellow they explode into
thousands of colors, and the whole room began to go up in flames!

"Nightlight I love you!"

Nightlight . . . "

 * * * * * * * *

""Nightlight!" A voice calls out to her from darkness. "Nightlight can
you hear me?"

At first the voice sounded like RODIMUS, but then it reveals itself to
be BUMP's.

"Are you okay? Your readings began to spike at the end."

Around NIGHTLIGHT was the familiar med chamber, BUMP was standing over
her CR chamber looking nervous. "It looks like you had some sort of
nightmare." He paused, "But it is rare for anyone to even dream in
CR." He looked confused but relaxing as NIGHTLIGHT's readings were
returning to normal.

"Boy, you had me scared for a minute there. It's okay now. Your safe,
its all right."

(TAG)

Preston
